Spells:
Alarm (W1 Abju): R30' Entry into 20' cu triggers audible or mental alarm for 8 hr
Beacon Of Hope (C3 Abju): R30' Targets gain Adv on Wis and death saves and maximum HP from healing for conc or 1 min
Blade Ward (W0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for 1 rd
Bless (C1 Ench): R30' 3 targets gain +1d4 on attacks and saving throws for conc or 1 min
Blindness/Deafness (C2 Necr): R30' Inflicts choice of blindness or deafness on target (Con neg) for 1 min
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Control Water (C4 Tran): R300' 100' water rises 20', parts, redirects, or whirlpools for conc or 10 min
Create Undead (C6 Necr): R10' 3 corpses become ghouls that obey self for 1 dy
Cure Wounds (C1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+2 HP
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Self senses poison for conc or 10 min
Dispel Evil And Good (C5 Abju): Inflicts Disadv on self attacks by outsider foes for conc or 1 min; touch breaks enchantment; spell attack dismisses (Cha neg)
Dream (C5 [Moon Domain] Illu): Touched communicates via dreams of known target
Etherealness (C7 Tran): Self enters Ethereal Plane for up to 8 hr
Faerie Fire (C1 [Moon Domain] Evoc): R60' Objects in 20' cu glow (foe Adv on attacks) (Dex neg) for conc or 1 min
Freedom Of Movement (C4 Abju): Touched gains immunity to impediments for 1 hr
Geas (C5 Ench): R60' Target obeys command (Wis neg) for 30 dy
Greater Invisibility (C4 [Moon Domain] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc or 1 min
Guardian Of Faith (C4 Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (Dex half) for 8 hr or 60 HP
Guidance (C0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc or 1 min
Guiding Bolt (C1 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP radiant, lights target (Adv on next foe attack) for 1 rd
Hallow (C5 Evoc): 60' radius becomes warded against outsiders and evokes boon effect
Hallucinatory Terrain (C4 [Moon Domain] Illu): R300' Creates 150' cu terrain illusion (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 dy
Holy Aura (C8 Abju): 30' radius targets gain Adv on saves and blind fiends and undead with melee hit (Con neg); foes suffer Disadv on attacks
Hypnotic Pattern (C3 [Moon Domain] Illu): R120' creatures in 30' cu charmed (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Invisibility (C2 [Moon Domain] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc or 1 hr or until attacks or casts
Light (C0 Evoc): Touched object lights 20' radius (Dex neg) for 1 hr
Major Image (C3 [Moon Domain] Illu): R120' Creates 20' cu sight, sound, and touch illusion for conc or 10 min
Mass Heal (C9 Evoc): R60' Targets regain 700 HP total and become unblinded, undeafened, and undiseased
Moonbeam (C2 [Moon Domain] Evoc): R120' 5' radius inflicts 2d10 HP radiant (Con half) for conc or 1 min
Passwall (C5 [Moon Domain] Tran): R30' Creates 5'x8'x20' passage through wood, plaster, or stone for 1 hr
Planar Ally (C6 Conj): R60' Self bargain for service from outsider
Protection From Poison (C2 Abju): Touched unpoisoned and gains Adv on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save w/in conc or 1 min
Resurrection (C7 Necr): Restores touched 100-year-old corpse to life
Revivify (C3 Necr): Restores touched 1-minute-old corpse to life w/1 HP
Sacred Flame (C0 Evoc): R60' Target suffers 4d8 HP radiant (Dex neg)

Spare The Dying (C0 Necr): Touched creature becomes stable
Spiritual Weapon (C2 Evoc): R60' Spectral weapon inflicts 1d8 + 2 HP and moves 20' for 1 min
Tongues (C3 Divi): Touched understands and speaks any language for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Know 2 W0 spells, cast 1 W1 spell/long rest
Blessing Of The Blood-Drenched Moon: R30' Use Channel Divinity to give target Adv on attack on foe w/in 5' of an ally for 10 min
Blessing Of The Watchful Moon: R30' Use Channel Divinity to give target +10 Speed and Adv on tracking and smell for 1 hr
Clarity Of Catha: R30' Use Reaction to give target Adv on Wis save 6/long rest
Divine Intervention: 100% chance of deity help 1/wk
Eclipse Of Ill Omen: 60' radius dim red glow blocks other light; targets suffer Disadv on saves, half speed, and no HP recovery for conc or 1 min 1/long rest
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Empowered Cantrips: +2 HP cantrip damage
Mind Of Two Moons: Use Channel Divinity to concentrate on two domain spells simultaneously
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
